short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome browser extension that allows you to quickly get words statistic on page or selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome browser extension provides instant statistics on the currently opened webpage. It can count the total number of words on the page or within selected text. Additionally, it identifies the most frequently used words and offers basic options for filtering these words to suit your needs.
